title: A Description of the island of Jamaica with the other isles and territories in America, to which the English are related ... : taken from the notes of Sr. Thomas Linch, Knight, governour of Jamaica, and other experienced persons in the said places : illustrated with maps / published by Richard Blome.
author: Blome, Richard, d. 1705.
publisher: Printed by T. Milbourn, and sold by the book-sellers of London and Westminster,
notes: First ed. Cf. BM. Identified in reel guide as Wing B3208.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
